extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

clusters.name: Temperature Control

attributes.name: TemperatureSetpoint
attributes.description: Represents the desired Temperature Setpoint on the device.

attributes.name: MinTemperature
attributes.description: Represents the minimum temperature to which the TemperatureSetpoint attribute MAY be set.

attributes.name: MaxTemperature
attributes.description: Represents the maximum temperature to which the TemperatureSetpoint attribute MAY be set.

attributes.name: Step
attributes.description: Represents the discrete value by which the TemperatureSetpoint attribute can be changed.

attributes.name: SelectedTemperatureLevel
attributes.description: Represents the currently selected temperature level setting of the server.

attributes.name: SupportedTemperatureLevels
attributes.description: Represents the list of supported temperature level settings.

parameters.description: Specifies both temperature setpoint and level index

clusters.description: This cluster provides an interface to the setpoint temperature on devices such as washers, refrigerators, and water heaters.
